entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:09 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:09 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:09 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
